nodes.title: The WhatsApp Group Leak
nodes.story: You're in res group study when your best friend slides you their phone. A leaked WhatsApp: your partner of two years planning a 'study session' with your roommate. 'My bed or yours? Mine squeaks lol.' Timestamp: last night while you were at work. Your roommate is across the table, innocent smile.

choices.text: Pretend you don't know, gather evidence

nodes.title: The Setup
nodes.story: You tell your partner you're visiting family for the weekend. Hide a recording device in your room. From your car outside res, you watch on your laptop camera: they enter your room with your roommate. Moans through the audio. You cry silently, recording everything.

nodes.title: Viral Revenge
nodes.story: You leak the audio to the res WhatsApp group. It spreads to the whole campus. 'Res 5B Sex Tape' trends. Your partner and roommate are shamed off campus. But you're also labeled 'psycho' for recording them. University investigates YOU for violation of privacy.

nodes.title: Legal Battles and Breakdown
nodes.story: Your ex and roommate sue you for defamation. Your parents mortgage their house for legal fees. You fail the semester. The court case drags for years. You see photos of them graduated, married, with a baby. You're 25, working at a call center, still in therapy.

choices.endingText: You never finish your degree. The case settles out of court. You move to a different city, change your name. Some betrayals cost more than a relationship.

nodes.title: Mature but Messy
nodes.story: You wait until morning. Show them the recording. They cry, beg forgiveness. Your roommate moves out. You try couples counseling through Student Wellness. The trust is gone. You stay together out of habit, checking each other's phones daily. The resentment grows.

choices.endingText: You graduate, get separate jobs in different provinces. At alumni events, you're civil. They marry someone else. You're relieved it wasn't you.
